page.title: 17THE PLAYING FIELD H.B.
page.content: Lots of things go on at our village playing field throughout the year. Here are some of them. We have a tennis court,a B.M.X. track a rounders pitch, a cricket pitch, a football pitch, and there are a few swings as well. We have a B.M.X. club which has races every Monday at half past six. We have got a tennis club and there is coaching at the courts every Saturday morning except in the winter. We are hoping to get another hard court in June or July.The tennis court that we have now is hard not grass. In the summer we have a tennis club barbecue. When the school plays a cricket match against other schools we play on the cricket pitch at the playing field. On November the fifth we have a bonfire there. There is a pavilion there which we are renovating.
